summary: Completed comprehensive testing of True or Totally Fake trivia game. Backend API fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend core gameplay works well with one critical clipboard permission issue blocking play again functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: Clipboard write permission denied causing runtime error overlay that blocks 'Play Again' button interaction
ui_bugs.error_message: Failed to execute 'writeText' on 'Clipboard': Write permission denied
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents users from playing again after game over
